title: Laxton
creator_credit: AVC Productions and University of Hull
brief_description: The story of Laxton, a village in Nottinghamshire, and its evolution from Norman times, showing how strip farming operated. Shows how a medieval management system fits into the modern agricultural scene. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
